episodes.title: Life With Grandpa and The Family International
episodes.description: Well, we have finally made it to our very first cult episode! Join us today as we dive into the crazy and disgusting mind of David "Grandpa" Berg, and his infamous sex cult: The Family International. We will also break down his sick and twisted television production, "Life With Grandpa", a demented puppet show created specifically for the grooming of children into his cult. Sources: Smartschoolboy9 doc creator exposed “perverted” kids TV show created by a cult - Daisy Phillipson https://www.dexerto.com/tv-movies/smartschoolboy9-documentary-creator-exposes-cult-life-with-grandpa-2982646/ The Life and Death of The “Children of God” Messiah - Peter Wilkinson https://www.rollingstone.com/culture/culture-features/children-of-god-cult-messiah-chosen-one-182272/ Life With Grandpa episode - UFO Cult VHS https://youtu.be/qz_1rsZ04Ew?si=yvLA2oW2eqze7xEc The Darkest Kids TV Show Ever Made - Nick Crowley https://youtu.be/RxdHAx_lZqo?si=-tqMEhwtmq22x-xt Life With Grandpa: Robot Song - Faded Endeavor https://youtu.be/fyTbIsDwofQ?si=TauE1EKRP7N0mThs The Family International (The Children of God) http://www.people.vcu.edu/~dbromley/undergraduate/spiritualCommunity/TheFamilyInternational.html https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ricky_Rodriguez https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Karen_Zerby https://www.karenzerby.org Like our podcast? Be sure to follow us on Facebook at The Ghosty Girls Podcast! You can also leave us some love on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@TheGhostyGirlsPodcast Have feedback or an idea for a show? E-mail us at: theghostygirlspodcast@gmail.com
